Megumi Oshima has been working at the [Pacific Islands Fisheries Science Center](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/about/pacific-islands-fisheries-science-center) since 2021. She works mostly on domestic and territorial bottomfish stocks and is interested in Openscience and creating reproducible and transparent workflows. Before joining PIFSC, she was a graduate student at University of Southern Mississippi where she got her PhD in Coastal Sciences.
